response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("age", "low", "Younger individuals are less likely to re-offend."),
    ("race/ethnicity", "medium", "White individuals have a lower risk of re-offending than other racial groups."),
    ("employment status", "high", "Employment is associated with reduced recidivism rates."),
    ("education level", "low", "Lower education levels are linked to higher recidivism rates."),
    ("marital status", "medium", "Marital status does not significantly impact risk of re-offending."),
    ("living arrangement", "medium", "Living alone is associated with a slightly increased risk of re-offending."),
    ("drug use in the past 4 years", "high", "Regular drug use increases recidivism rates."),
    ("depression status", "low", "Depression does not significantly impact risk of re-offending."),
    ("religion/beliefs", "medium", "Religious beliefs do not influence risk of re-offending."),
    ("urban area", "high", "Urban areas are associated with higher recidivism rates.")
  ],
  "prediction": "NO",
  "confidence": 90
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is an 18-year-old male who identifies himself as White. He has been arrested 1 time but has not been convicted. He is 6 feet 1 inch and weighs 165 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He has a GED certificate and is not enrolled in college. He has held 2 jobs during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana) and has not felt depressed over the past month. At a young age, he lived with both of his biological parents in a household of size 6, in an urban area. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
